data.englishTranslation: I seek refuge in Allah from satan the outcast (then you should desist from doing what you are in doubt about).
I believe in Allah and His Messenger.
He is the First and the Last, the Most High and the Most Near. And He is the Knower of all things.
data.transliteration: Huwal-'Awwalu wal-'Aakhiru wadh-Dhaahiru wal-Baatinu, wa Huwa bikulli shay'in 'Aleem.
data.arabicVerse: هُوَ الأَوَّلُ وَالآخِرُ وَالظَّاهِرُ وَالْبَاطِنُ وَهُوَ بِكُلِّ شَيءٍ عَلِيمٌ
